thread.title: BRIEF-Compass Diversified- Proposed Private Offering Of $400 Mln Of Senior Unsecured Notes Due 2026

title: BRIEF-Compass Diversified- Proposed Private Offering Of $400 Mln Of Senior Unsecured Notes Due 2026
text:
April 2, 2018 / 11:10 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Compass Diversified- Proposed Private Offering Of $400 Mln Of Senior Unsecured Notes Due 2026 Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Compass Diversified Holdings: 
* HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PRIVATE OFFERING OF $400 MILLION OF SENIOR UNSECURED NOTES DUE 2026 
* TO USE PROCEEDS OF NOTES OFFERING, WITH CASH & BORROWINGS TO REPAY DEBT UNDER CO’S EXISTING CREDIT FACILITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
